traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the alicorn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8), Unit piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The alicorn’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: * At will: detect evil and good, druidcraft, pass without trace * 1/day each: calm emotions, dispel evil and good, entangle

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The alicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The alicorn’s weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The alicorn makes one attack with its hooves and one attack with its horn.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Horn
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.desc: The alicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically restores 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

actions.name: Teleport (1/Day)
actions.desc: The alicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the alicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

legendary.name: Hooves
legendary.desc: The alicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

legendary.name: Prismatic Barrier (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: The alicorn creates a prismatic, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the alicorn’s next turn.

legendary.name: Heal Self (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.desc: The alicorn magically restores 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points.
